markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Sulfur Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1257)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Olfactory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=246" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A thick, sulfurous, irritating gas fills this golden-yellow flask. A sulfur bomb deals the listed damage. On a hit, the target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) on a critical hit. Creatures hit with this bomb are temporarily immune to the effects of the bomb for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sulfur Bomb (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d4 acid damage and 1 acid splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sulfur Bomb (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d4 acid damage and 2 acid splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sulfur Bomb (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 275 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 acid damage and 3 acid splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sulfur Bomb (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d4 acid damage and 4 acid splash damage.
name: Sulfur Bomb (Greater)
